Package com.intellij.codeInsight.editorActions

Interface JoinLinesHandlerDelegate

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JoinRawLinesHandlerDelegate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignmentSequenceJoinLinesHandler, BlockJoinLinesHandler, ChainCallJoinLinesHandler, CommentJoinLinesHandler, DeclarationJoinLinesHandler, GrJoinBlockStatementHandler, GrJoinControlStatementHandler, GrJoinLinesHandlerBase, GrJoinStatementsHandler, GrVariableJoinLinesHandler, LiteralJoinLinesHandler, NestedIfJoinLinesHandler, PropertiesJoinLinesHandler, PyJoinLinesHandler

    public interface JoinLinesHandlerDelegate
    Allows to customize Edit|Join Lines.

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<JoinLinesHandlerDelegate> EP_NAME

      • CANNOT_JOIN

        static final int CANNOT_JOIN
        Return this from tryJoinLines(com.intellij.openapi.editor.Document, com.intellij.psi.PsiFile, int, int) if it could not join the lines.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • tryJoinLines

        int tryJoinLines(Document document,
                 PsiFile file,
                 int start,
                 int end)
        Tries to join lines at the specified position of the specified file. Method is called on a document where part of whitespace between lines is already stripped, and it has a chance to smooth out the join point.
        Parameters:
        document - where the lines are
        file - where the lines are
        start - offset where the whitespace between lines starts
        end - offset where the whitespace between lines ends
        Returns:
        the position to place the caret after the operation, or CANNOT_JOIN if this handler was not able to perform the operation.
